column1: Why…
I feel like I’ve been flying around in circles from the start
and I just can't get out of here;
besides, what are all these strange lights?
This is the mirror world.
You've entered my trap.
Trap? How can this be!?
Since when?
It's because of those meteor fragments you were collecting.
Those lights emitted by them has made you lose your way.
Light!?
Oh, you don't know?
Those fragments contain a great amount of magic power.
For ordinary humans like you, collecting too many of those will make you lose your way.
So yes, it is very easy to entrap you.
How can this be…
Are you still confused?
Anyway, it doesn’t really matter anymore.
I am sure the elder sister has already had enough time to prepare the prayer ritual.
Just what in the world are you guys planning!?
It is none of your concern.
I'll let you go once the prayer ritual has ended.
I'll not wait and let you do as you please.
Since the fragments no longer confuse me,
I'll use my own strength to escape!
Is that so?
What an ignorant human you are.
Well then, I shall mercifully
bury you in this mirror world.
